The following are some hints that I have collected for building Ubuntu Kernels.

=== Kernel Configuration ===

If you want to use the 'gtk' configuration client (make gconf), you need the following packages..

 libglade2-dev

=== Hardware information ===

  packages: pciutils, usbutils

Use the the scripts 'update-pciids' and 'update-usbids' to update the lists of id's from their maintainers.
